meanings.definition: The state or quality of being lognormal.
meanings.sent1: The lognormalities of the data set made it easy to analyze.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the lognormalities of various phenomena to understand their patterns.
meanings.sent3: The lognormalities in the experiment results were so clear, even the lab rat could see them!
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of the lognormalities in finance was as sharp as a knife.
meanings.sent5: The professor's explanation of lognormalities was so vivid, it felt like a painting coming to life.

meanings.definition: An instance of deviation from a lognormal distribution.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected lognormalities in the data puzzled the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The lognormalities in the stock market were causing fluctuations in prices.
meanings.sent3: The lognormalities in the weather forecast made the meteorologist scratch his head.
meanings.sent4: The lognormalities in her behavior were like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The lognormalities in the system were so pronounced, they couldn't be ignored.
